Subject: EPP console login UI freezes for a minute after entering a wrong password
Description:
Hello,

Customer name is PrivatBank.
They reported that the EPP console login UI freezes for a minute after entering a wrong password.
Server shows an error "Unfortunately, the login process encountered an error.  Please try again" that's why customer should wait a few minutes to try login again.
I've checked in our EPP UI and if we enter a wrong password, the console does not freeze and return only "The username or password you entered is incorrect." without any error.
I will attach screenshots a bit later.
